title: SunCafe
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Take-out, Catering, Fusion
description: Originally SunPower Natural Cafe, this vegan and raw food restaurant moved into this larger spce from Cahuenga Blvd in July 2014 and expanded its menu to include a greater variety of fusion and comfort vegan cuisine. Features raw food dishes lettuce tacos and pizza to cooked vegan meals like white truffle fettucine and the Sun burger. Enjoy a selection of rich smoothies, cupcakes, and raw pies. Sunday brunch til 3pm.
